dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.policy.fmk.PolicyGroup
dataStructure.description:
This class is a generalized aggregation container. It enables PolicyRules and/or PolicyGroups to be aggregated in a single container. Note that loops, including the degenerate case of a PolicyGroup that contains itself, are not allowed when PolicyGroups contain other PolicyGroups.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: PolicyGroup

child.name: policyEvent
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association PolicyGroupExecutionDetails

This association end is optional
child.label: policyEvent
